xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for determining differences in XML documents.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xmldiff:compare
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: xmldiff:compare($node-set-1 as node()*, $node-set-2 as node()*) as xs:boolean?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns true() if the two node sets $node-set-1 and $node-set-2 are equal, otherwise false()
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:boolean? : true() if the two node sets $node-set-1 and $node-set-2 are equal, otherwise false()
